title: Analyst: U.S. Needs To 'Deconflict' Syria To Defeat ISIS
teaser: How does the U.S. destroy the self-declared Islamic State without aiding the Syrian regime? NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Christopher Harmer of the Institute for the Study of War about options.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
